option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: New-Item -Force -ItemType directory -Path .cache/DepotDownloader | Out-Null; curl https://github.com/SteamRE/DepotDownloader/releases/download/DepotDownloader_2.4.5/depotdownloader-2.4.5.zip -o .cache/depotdownloader-2.4.5.zip; tar -xf .cache/depotdownloader-2.4.5.zip -C .cache/DepotDownloader; Remove-Item .cache/depotdownloader-2.4.5.zip
